```{css, echo = FALSE}

.header {
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: white;
  display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 2000px;
}

.header a {
  float: right;
  color: black;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 18px;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 20px;
  line-height: 35px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  max-width: 2000px;
}

.header a:hover {
  background-color: #a7daf5;
  color: black;
}

.main-container {
    background-color: #042155;
    max-width: 100%;
}

.white-box {
    background-color: white;
    color: black;
    max-width: 2000px;
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    width: 100%;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 15px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 15px;
}

.green_seperator {
    background-color: #a7daf5;
    clear: both;
    height: 10px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 2000px;
}

.fisheye-title {
    padding : 20px 0px 20px 35px;
    font-family: Arial Narrow;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: #1a5d99;
}

.h3 {
    padding : 20px 0px 20px 35px;
    font-size: 19.0pt;
    font-family: "Helvetica", sans-serif;
    color: #2C3E50

}

.italic-title {
    padding : 20px 0px 20px 35px;
    font-size: 14.0pt;
    font-family: "Helvetica", sans-serif;
    color: #2C3E50

}

.body-text {
    line-height: 16.05pt;
    text-align: start;
    padding : 3px 35px 20px 35px;
    font-size: 11.5pt;
    font-family: "Helvetica", sans-serif;
    color:#2C3E50
}

.framefooterleftitem {
    border: 0 solid #CCCCCC;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
    font-size: 11px;
    font-weight: normal;
    background-color: #042155;
    height: 3em;
    float : left;
    padding : 0px 15px 0px 3px;
}

.framefooterrightitem {
    border: 0 solid #CCCCCC;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;
    font-size: 11px;
    font-weight: normal;
    background-color: #042155;
    height: 3em;
    float : right;
    padding : 0px 15px 0px 3px;
}
```
